EmailTemplate.name: 2013 UnBounce SOW PPC.Thank You - non-Opt in
EmailTemplate.subject: The documents you requested from MBO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for requesting the Statement of Work Template and ultimate SOW Guide! Creating a strong SOW is an important step to ensure a healthy and successful consulting project.
Click here <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Statement-Scope-of-Work-2013.pdf> to access your full SOW guide, or here <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/SOW%20Template.pdf> to access your sample SOW template.
At MBO Partners, we are passionate about helping you succeed in your solo career. From taxes and contracts, to accounting and expense management, our solution can empower you to do what you do best, while we take care of the details.
Curious? Learn more about h <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>ow MBO works here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>, and feel free to contact me if you'd like to talk about how our solution can support your business! ___________________________________ {{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=edit me}} {{lead.Lead Owner Last Name:default=edit me}} {{lead.Lead Owner Job Title:default=edit me}} MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6070 e: {{lead.Lead Owner Email Address:default=edit me}} w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
